link_desc:
This is a media type for sending notifications to Google Chat using their API.

This requires Zabbix 5+ .

Please refer to https://developers.google.com/hangouts/chat/how-tos/webhooks

Set global macro {$ZABBIX.URL} with your Zabbix server URL.

Add a dedicated user with the media type "Google Chat" and place the webhook url into the gchat_endpoint parameter to integrate into the service.
tags: media type, webhook, javascript, google, chat
author: Matt Haught
